description:
CNC machined from a block of 6061 aluminum, this stem keeps weight low and strength high. With its short design the Range stem gives you a dialed steering response that will have you threading through trees.

  • 35mm clamp for connecting to what is fast becoming the new standard in all mountain bars
  • Torque specs are laser engraved onto the stem, removing the guess work
  • 0° rise maintains your bike’s intended geometry
  • 38mm stack height
  • Fits 1 1/8in. steerer tubes
  • If you aren’t sure what length is right for you look at what your bike came with, going longer will add a little more weight over the front wheel and can help on the climbs, going shorter provides a more connected feeling to your bike’s front end
name: PNW Components Range Gen 3 35mm Stem
